item.description:
You know that practicing meditation would help lower your stress levels. You know that meditation will help you with all the chatter in your mind, with trouble sleeping, and will improve your overall well-being. You might have even sat down to meditation only to find yourself easily distracted and agitated even more! No need to give up though! Whether you tried meditation before or not, you will learn something new in this class.

We will go over some different meditation techniques so that you find some that work better for you:

  • Focusing on the breath
  • Creating an easy imagery to visualize
  • Using a mantra to focus your mind
  • Movement meditation

We will also discuss the posture, mudras (hand-gestures), and have fun while meditating!

You will feel a difference right away!

Olga Kaminsky is a Reiki Master Teacher and a yoga teacher who made a jump from a corporate high-tech to a world of alternative healing shortly after her Reiki Master training. She has been offering Reiki, yoga, and other healing modalities to her clients since 2009. Olga started on her Reiki journey in 2005 after feeling an energy flow during a yoga class. Learning and growing never stops and Olga is now continuing her education at Southwest Institute of Healing Arts, working towards a diploma in Mind Body Wellness.
